data.name: Consume Thy Flesh: The Pumpkin Smashing Sim
data.detailed_description:
From one of the designers on Murderhouse!

Consume Thy Flesh is a bite-sized physics based Halloween hootenanny! Players must roll their gargantuan gourd to blood-thirsty rug-rats below, so they may dine on your candy packed insides. Maintain momentum, catch some sick air, and splatter your insides all over. The ravenous spirits of Samhain must be satiated.

Hello Boils and Ghouls, you're in for a treat!



  • Unlock and explore 15 handcrafted levels!
  • Master your gourd physics, and hurl yourself over the moonlit rooftops of this spooky little town!
  • Splatter your candy filled insides inside the target zone of sugar crazed trick-r-treaters and collect candy corn coins for maximum points!
  • Help shut the door between the world of the living and the dead!







Full controller support or use mouse and keyboard!

*Controller recommended for maximum fun*

- WASD for movement

- E for Boost

- R for Jump

- Mouse for Camera

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86 32 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 194 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
